abstract: Apple severed ties with SurfaceInk, which had helped Apple develop some of its products, after the small company showcased its own tablet computer in June.
snippet: Apple severed ties with SurfaceInk, which had helped Apple develop some of its products, after the small company showcased its own tablet computer in June.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Apple severed ties with a small Silicon Valley design firm that for nearly a decade had helped with the development of some of its products, after the firm showcased its own prototype tablet computer.

headline.main: Developer of Tablets Loses Apple as Customer
headline.print_headline: Developer Of Tablets Loses Apple As Customer

abstract: Interval Licensing is suing a cluster of defendants, including AOL, eBay, Facebook, Netflix, Office Depot, OfficeMax, Staples, Yahoo and YouTube.
snippet: Interval Licensing is suing a cluster of defendants, including AOL, eBay, Facebook, Netflix, Office Depot, OfficeMax, Staples, Yahoo and YouTube.
lead_paragraph: A company owned by Paul Allen, co-founder of Microsoft, filed suit on Friday against Google, Apple and nine other companies, contending that their online navigation and viewing technology illegally uses patented inventions created by Mr. Allen’s research firm, which is now defunct.

headline.main: Paul Allen’s Company Files Broad Lawsuit Over Patents
headline.print_headline: Paul Allen’s Company Files Broad Lawsuit Over Patents

abstract: A video shows Steven P. Jobs in shorts, introducing a new ad campaign, “Think Different.”
snippet: A video shows Steven P. Jobs in shorts, introducing a new ad campaign, “Think Different.”
lead_paragraph: 11:29 a.m. | Updated Correcting transcript of Apple ad.
